Package com.nrifintech.cms.errorcontroller

Class ErrorController

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
com.nrifintech.cms.errorcontroller.ErrorController
@ControllerAdvice @RestController public class ErrorController extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
> This class is a controller advice handles exceptions globally across the whole application
